story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_0200:
Team Plasma’s scheme failed. They were thwarted
by a group from Unova.
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_0400:
He outwitted us by taking advantage of our
scheme, yet he was defeated so easily.
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_0500:
Yes, sir. The former king, N, and his friends
managed to stop him...
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_0600: The power they possess is extremely dangerous.
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_0700:
It may become a threat to Team Rocket in
the future.
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_0900: All we have to do is make that power ours.
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_1000:
By the way, did Ghetsis simply retreat after
he lost?
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_1100: Yes... I heard he just left.
story_teamplasma_02_10000/2401_1001_1300: It seems he has another plan in mind...
